channel.title: Npc wont attack back 317
channel.description: alright so i made a customs protector dragon npc and everything works fine exept like when you attack it it doesnt attack you back however i dont wanna make it agressive cus if i do it will follow you and the cutsoms area is next to my home so you know what i mean any suggestions??
